tool.name: Average With Thereshold 2
tool.description: Average 2 With Thereshold for Grids calculates average in X and Y distances unsing only the values that differ form central pixel less than a specified threshold. Each value has a weight which is inversely proportional to the distance (method 1).

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid.

param.name: THRESH
param.label: Threshold
param.help: The values in the specified radius is used in the average calculation only if its difference with the central value is lesser or equal to this threshold.
